name: BodenScooterrr
description:
This game is a snowmobile game and it's hardcore. Try beat the game! Enyoy!

The game includes 3 different levels and if u die on one of them you spawn on level 1 again.

This game is produced by Charlie, Leon, Hugo and Sven and we call ourself for Strange production!

This game was made for game jam BODEN.

arts/sound Hugo

Map desinger Charlie

Main coder Leon

extra help sven.

Hope we hope to do this again it was fun!
